settings.text: Unleash your creativity with our customizable options! Add your own text and design to our art prints, making them perfect for commemorating special occasions or expressing your unique personality.

settings.artInfo: Add text for celebrations and occasions.
Easily change the art for different seasons or occasions.
Automatic shutoff means there’s no need to manually turn it on or off.

settings.pairInfo: Harnessing patented solar technology, ArtGlo’s Easel 1.0  signs automatically light up for 4 hours every night, requiring no manual intervention. Enjoy the beauty of your customized print.

From design to display, simplicity is at the core of our product. Mount the panel with brackets or place it in your yard using the included stand. To change a design, simply peel off the existing print and stick on the new one. Let ArtGlo brighten your space effortlessly.
With ArtGlo, your sign is your canvas. Choose from over 1,000 designs, add personalized text, or upload your approved design. Tailor your ArtGlo panel to reflect your style, message, and brand.

settings.title: Endless Possibilities
settings.description: With hundreds of prints available, you can find the perfect art to match your style. Whether you want to celebrate holidays, show your political affiliations, or display your love for sports, ArtGlo has the ideal panel for you.

settings.heading: Add the Easel
settings.description: In order to display and illuminate your art, you will first need an Easel 1.0. This is the base unit that includes an illumination panel, mounting brackets, and a yard stand
settings.label: A specific glow unique to ArtGlo, not a bright light.

settings.heading: Find a print
settings.description: ArtGlo has hundreds of prints you can order for your Easel 1.0. Find the perfect print and add it to your order.
settings.label: When you purchase an Easel 1.0 your first print is free!

settings.heading: Set it up
settings.description: Mount your easel with brackets or place it in your yard using the included stand (make sure it has some sun). It will automatically illuminate at night and will stay illuminated for 4 hours.

settings.heading: Endless opportunities
settings.description: Keep building your art collection for only $29 at piece. Whether you want to express yourself, or just decorate your yard differently for specific occasions like Xmas, Halloween, Birthdays and so on, we got you!

settings.heading: Subscribe to our Newsletter
settings.info: Be first to get update for a diverse collection of prints, curated to reflect your unique style. From holiday celebrations to political expressions and sports enthusiasms, ArtGlo offers the perfect panel for every passion.

settings.question: What is Faq?
settings.Answer: A FAQ page is one of the most important and must-have sections for business and product websites. If you’ve been wondering what a FAQ page really is or how to create one for your website, you’ve come to the right place. If you still don’t have a FAQ page on your website, you’re already missing out on many benefits it can bring you. Like saving hours worth of sales calls or emails and helping potential buyers make a decision all by themselves. In this detailed guide, we’re going to dive deep into the whole concept of FAQs. To discover their main purpose and to find out how it can help generate more sales and leads for your business.
